projectGridLines.stationName: ITILITE Technologies Private Limited - Performance Marketing
projectGridLines.title: Performance marketing Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Execute and manage the performance marketing campaigns of the company across google, Bing and Linkedin

Skill sets: basic knowledge of digital marketing

Traits expectation: strong analytical skills and a go-getter attitude

Expected learning: a thorough understanding of the digital marketing aspects of a business

Specific courses required for project execution: brownie point for folks with a digital marketing course
